mod.chat_plays_mc.name: Chat Plays MC
advancements.chat_plays_mc.orio.title: The Ingredients for Soap
advancements.chat_plays_mc.orio.descript: Craft some Orios using wheat, an apple, coal, and a water bucket.
advancements.chat_plays_mc.soap.title: Actually Just Soap
advancements.chat_plays_mc.soap.descript: It would be really stupid to eat this soap.
advancements.chat_plays_mc.bitten_soap.d: You really ate the soap? Why would you do that?
advancements.chat_plays_mc.sherd.title: Archaeology Isn't Dead
advancements.chat_plays_mc.sherd.descrip: Find an ancient relic of the past via archaeology. They say his name was Alex
text.config.chat_plays_mc.title: Chat Plays MC
text.config.chat_plays_mc.option.twitchC: The Twitch channel to connect to for commands
text.config.chat_plays_mc.option.useOldT: If enabled, the old towering mechanic will be used instead of the new one. The old method applies a flat velocity, and if not used properly, can cause the player to float into the sky indefinitely.
text.config.chat_plays_mc.option.useOldJ: If enabled, the old jump mechanics will be used instead of the new ones. The old method calls 'player.jump()' which just adds velocity, and ignores if the player is on the ground, allowing flight if chat can coordinate well.
text.config.chat_plays_mc.option.showHud: If enabled, a custom HUD will be displayed in the top left corner of the screen, showing the current player and chat information.
text.config.chat_plays_mc.option.enableL: If enabled, chat can use the 'lock on <entity>' and 'target next | previous | nearest' commands to lock on to entities.
text.config.chat_plays_mc.option.enableS: If enabled, chat can use the 'swim' command to make the player bob in water as if holding the jump key.
If enabled, chat can craft and use the 'shaft builder' command to build a mine shaft stairwell in the world. The shaft will be built in the direction the player is facing.
The depth of the shaft that will be built by the shaft builder. The shaft will be built in the direction the player is facing.
